statements: UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET username = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'Login Successful', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET username = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 102
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark', auto_play = true WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET location = 'New York', duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 101 AND behavior_type = 'Login';
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'Dark Mode', auto_play = true, notification_enabled = true WHERE user_id = 202;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_actions SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type='login' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value='dark mode' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserAccounts SET username='john_doe_updated' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserFeedback SET rating=5, feedback_text='Great experience!' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserAccounts SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '1a2b3c4d';
UPDATE UserFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service!', rating = 5 WHERE user_id = '5e6f7g8h';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE UserBehaviorData SET behavior_type = 'Click', event_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', event_details = '{"page": "Home", "action": "Click on button"}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
